title: Looking for a ranked team
body:
Hey there,

Me (ADC Gold Elo) and my friend (Mid Gold Elo, S4 Diamond) are looking for new members for our ranked team.
We are looking for some members who have passion playing league of legends and capable of handling tough situations ingame.

We both are very calm and positive during the game and always trying to improve ourselves. 
Criticism is something very important for a team which wants to improve and climb the ladder to the top.

Although you have to be an active member and playing on a regular basis.

At this moment we need a jungler, a toplaner and a support with some experience on the rift. We don't really think it's important which elo you are,
because silver players can have a good attitude and a good playstyle just like plats or diamonds.

So if you're looking for a team which wants to play serious just add me.

IGN: 'Lagamey', 'Madlife Inc', 'DuoQ Deathrocket' and 'Dyrus is my hero' (smurfs)


Have a good time!
